import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { Card, CardTitle, Row, Col, Button } from "reactstrap"; import { Box, Tabs, Tab } from '@mui/material'; import { RiEditBoxLine } from "react-icons/ri"; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles'; import Switch, { SwitchProps } from '@mui/material/Switch'; import Radio from '@mui/material/Radio'; import RadioGroup from '@mui/material/RadioGroup'; import FormControlLabel from '@mui/material/FormControlLabel'; import { ReactComponent as Code } from "../../assets/images/logos/code.svg"; import { ReactComponent as Eye } from "../../assets/images/logos/eye.svg"; import { ReactComponent as Image } from "../../assets/images/logos/image.svg"; import { ReactComponent as MoreSite } from "../../assets/images/logos/moresite.svg"; import { ReactComponent as Paint } from "../../assets/images/logos/paint.svg"; import { ReactComponent as SiteMap } from "../../assets/images/logos/sitemap.svg"; import { ReactComponent as WWW } from "../../assets/images/logos/www.svg"; import large from "../../assets/images/bg/store-large.png"; import medium from "../../assets/images/bg/store-medium.png"; import small from "../../assets/images/bg/store-small.png"; import './online.css' TabPanel.propTypes = { children: PropTypes.node, index: PropTypes.number.isRequired, value: PropTypes.number.isRequired, }; function TabPanel(props) { const { children, value, index, ...other } = props; return (

); } function a11yProps(index) { return { id: `simple-tab-${index}`, 'aria-controls': `simple-tabpanel-${index}`, }; } const IOSSwitch = styled((props) => ( ))(({ theme }) => ({ width: 42, height: 26, padding: 0, '& .MuiSwitch-switchBase': { padding: 0, margin: 2, transitionDuration: '300ms', '&.Mui-checked': { transform: 'translateX(16px)', color: '#fff', '& + .MuiSwitch-track': { backgroundColor: theme.palette.mode === 'dark' ? '#2ECA45' : '#65C466', opacity: 1, border: 0, }, '&.Mui-disabled + .MuiSwitch-track': { opacity: 0.5, }, }, '&.Mui-focusVisible .MuiSwitch-thumb': { color: '#33cf4d', border: '6px solid #fff', }, '&.Mui-disabled .MuiSwitch-thumb': { color: theme.palette.mode === 'light' ? theme.palette.grey[100] : theme.palette.grey[600], }, '&.Mui-disabled + .MuiSwitch-track': { opacity: theme.palette.mode === 'light' ? 0.7 : 0.3, }, }, '& .MuiSwitch-thumb': { boxSizing: 'border-box', width: 22, height: 22, }, '& .MuiSwitch-track': { borderRadius: 26 / 2, backgroundColor: theme.palette.mode === 'light' ? '#E9E9EA' : '#39393D', opacity: 1, transition: theme.transitions.create(['background-color'], { duration: 500, }), }, })); const Webstore = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState(0); const [storeImage, setStoreImage] = useState(large); const handleChange = (event, newValue) => { setValue(newValue); }; const changeImgaeSize = (key) => { switch(key) { case 0 : setStoreImage(large) break; case 1 : setStoreImage(medium) break; default: setStoreImage(small) } } const ImageAspectRatio = (key) => { console.log(key) } return( <>

Sell Everywhere

Website with a built-in e-commerce enabling you to start selling online at any time.Need help?

Online Store

store76217794.company.site

Preview your site to see what it looks like to your customers. Edit your Instant Site at any time to keep its appearance and content up to date.

Preview Site
Design

Personalize your Instant Site and your storefront’s appearance to reflect your unique brand. Need some inspiration? View demo Instant Site

Site appearance

Customize your site the way you like it. Upload your logo and background image, adjust the color of texts and other elements, change your site’s layout and style without getting into code.

Site content

Fill up your site with the info about your business: describe who you are, add social proof and links to your social media. Update the content of your site to promote special events and stay connected with your customers.

Domain name and site address

Help customers find you and stand out from the crowd by including the name of your business in your web address.

Site address

Link your Instant Site with your own purchased domain name if you have one or use a free address provided by Lightspeed eCom (E-Series).

Current address: store76217794.company.site

SEO settings

Control how your site interacts with search engines like Google.

Read SEO 101
Header meta tags and site verification

Add a custom code to the head section of your Instant Site to verify it in Google, Pinterest, and other services.

Sitemap

Sitemap helps search robots to index pages of your site faster. Use the URL below to point search engines directly to your sitemap.

Sitemap URL: store76217794.company.site/sitemap.xml

Allow search engines to index Instant Site

This lets search engines display your Instant Site in search results. If you do not want your Instant Site to appear in search results, turn this option off.

Add your store to other sites

With Lightspeed eCom (E-Series), you can add your store to any number of websites and sell where your customers are.

Add your store to one more website

Pick a platform of your liking where you’d like to run Lightspeed eCom (E-Series). Lightspeed eCom (E-Series) integrates seamlessly with most sitebuilders and platforms.

Website with a built-in e-commerce enabling you to start selling online at any time.Need help?

Image size

Large images help represent products in detail. Small images let you display more products in the Product List.

changeImgaeSize(0) }/> } label="Large" />

Large images are best for products where every detail is a part of the product’s value.

changeImgaeSize(1) } />} label="Medium" />

A well-balanced option that works with the majority of products.

changeImgaeSize(2) } />} label="Small" />

Compact images reveal less detail, but allow you to fit in more products for your customers to see on the screen.
Image aspect ratio

Landscape orientation is best for products with horizontal images. Portrait orientation is meant for vertical images. Square is for images of equal proportions, which is ideal for small merchandise.

ImageAspectRatio(0) }/> } label="Square 1:1" /> ImageAspectRatio(1) } />} label="Landscape 4:3" /> ImageAspectRatio(2) } />} label="Landscape 3:2" /> ImageAspectRatio(3) } />} label="Portrait 3:4" /> ImageAspectRatio(4) } />} label="Portrait 2:3" />

Continue processing open sales. Need help?

 ) } export default Webstore;
